attributes.action: Nigel Farage,  Must be included in any talks on Brexit with Conservative.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit must take place...regardless if you vote was remain...its democratic.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage. Has spent half of his life fighting for are freedom,   he must be part of the talks with the government.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions asking for people to be given a particular job or role.
